sections.purpose: To dry and flatten plant specimens for permanent herbarium storage.
sections.scope: Applicable to preparation of herbarium sheets.
procedure: Arrange plant parts between blotting paper sheets.
Place in newspaper or herbarium paper.
Stack in the press with cardboard separators.
Leave for 2â€“4 weeks, changing blotting paper weekly.
Mount dried specimens on herbarium sheets.
precautions: Use absorbent blotting paper to prevent mold.
Avoid excessive pressure causing tissue damage.
Store press in dry, ventilated area.
